document.full_text: palestinian journalists are abused with impunity by the security services of west bank-based president mahmoud abbas and his islamist rivals hamas in the gaza strip, human rights watch said on wednesday.
document.title: palestinian forces abuse wbank, gaza reporters: hrw
lines_and_colors: palestinian journalists are abused with impunity by the security services of west bank-based president mahmoud abbas and his islamist rivals hamas in the gaza strip, human rights watch said on wednesday.
